joyride.welcome: Thank you for downloading the app! You can take a quick __steps__-step tour to understand how easy it is to share your files.

steps.1: You can share files and folders using these inputs or their shortcuts
steps.2: This switch toggles between private and public sharing scopes
steps.2_1: Private: Will share your files only within your Wi-Fi or local network
steps.2_2: Public: Allows sharing over the internet, making it accessible to anyone
steps.3: This is your history. By right-clicking on an entry, you can reshare, open the folder, or delete a history entry.
